sentences.en: Adaptive strategies may often evolve, such as the biochemical polymorphisms of blood and serum groups.
sentences.cn: 适应策略也常常进化, 例如:血型和血清的生化多形现象就是这样的.

sentences.en: And what technology is really about is better ways to evolve.
sentences.cn: 那么,演化就是改变竞赛规则来延长赛局的方式.

sentences.en: Animals have evolved camouflage to protect themselves from predators.
sentences.cn: 动物进化形成了伪装，以保护自身不被捕食性动物所捕食。

sentences.en: Birds are widely believed to have evolved from dinosaurs.
sentences.cn: 鸟类普遍被认为是从恐龙进化而来的。

sentences.en: Businesses need to evolve rapidly.
sentences.cn: 各项业务需要快速发展。

sentences.en: Gastric and duodenal ulcers were noted to evolve from early superficial mucosal disease.
sentences.cn: 在早期浅表的粘膜病变上出现胃和十二指肠溃疡.

sentences.en: Geographic isolation forces all animals to evolve on their own separate paths.
sentences.cn: 地理隔离促使动物们向着不同的方向进化.

sentences.en: Great historical achievements often evolve from simple concepts.
sentences.cn: 历史上的壮举,往往是从朴素的概念演变过来的.

sentences.en: He argued that organisms evolve gradually by accumulating small hereditary changes.
sentences.cn: 他论证说,生物是由于一些小的遗传变异的积累而逐渐演变的.

sentences.en: How did you evolve this very personal and original style?
sentences.cn: 你是怎样逐步形成这种很有个性且具独创性的风格的?

sentences.en: If living creatures can indeed evolve, then human nature cannot remain unchanged.
sentences.cn: ,如果生物真会进化, 人性就不能永久不变.

sentences.en: That anything novel ever surmounts these hurdles to evolve is astounding.
sentences.cn: 任何能够跨越种种障碍以求进化的新颖事物都令人惊骇.

sentences.en: The bright plumage of many male birds was thought to have evolved to attract females.
sentences.cn: 许多雄鸟的鲜艳羽毛被认为是为吸引雌鸟而进化来的。

sentences.en: The chances are that one will evolve spontaneously, if at all.
sentences.cn: 这个只能靠慢慢的自然形成.

sentences.en: The school has evolved its own style of teaching.
sentences.cn: 学校逐步形成了自己的教学风格。

sentences.en: These are the kinds of contacts that could evolve into mentors.
sentences.cn: 这些人是可能会成为你导师.

sentences.en: We can evolve the truth from a mass of confused evidence.
sentences.cn: 我们可以从庞杂的证据中推断事实真相.

sentences.en: We had to evolve the truth from a mass of confused evidence.
sentences.cn: 我们不得不从大量庞杂的证据中推断出事情的真相.

sentences.en: We have to exchange ideas in order to evolve as human beings.
sentences.cn: 我们因为要促进人类发展所以要交换意见.

sentences.en: With the power of advanced technique, we evolve and refine principle.
sentences.cn: 我们用先进技术的力量改进和发展原则.

words.tran_cn: 发展，进展；进化；逐步形成

trans.tran_en: if an animal or plant evolves, it changes gradually over a long period of time
When animals or plants evolve, they gradually change and develop into different forms
to develop and change gradually over a long period of time
